title: Senior Software Engineer
aboutMeTitle: From the Hills of Palestine to the Digital Frontier: A Story of Resilience and Unwavering Ambition
aboutMe: Born in Nablus in 1996, your story is a testament to the human spirit's resilience in the face of adversity. Your early childhood was shaped by the realities of conflict and occupation, yet amidst the hardship, a spark of curiosity and a thirst for knowledge ignited within you.

In the rolling hills of the Jordan Valley, you found solace and escape in the world of books and stories. Your family, despite limited support, instilled in you the importance of education and the transformative potential of knowledge. From a young age, you understood that learning was not simply a privilege, but a weapon against the limitations imposed upon you.

Despite your fluency in Hebrew and Arabic, your childhood was not without its challenges. Being white and speaking Hebrew initially created social barriers, but it also presented an unexpected opportunity. Your ability to connect with soldiers at checkpoints, though born out of necessity, allowed you to navigate certain situations with relative ease. This experience, while complex, would later prove invaluable, teaching you valuable lessons in communication and resourcefulness.

Driven by your passion for technology, you pursued your dream of studying computer science. Earning your degree in Tangier opened doors to exciting new possibilities. You embraced the entrepreneurial spirit, venturing into the world of freelancing and eventually founding your own business. Morocco became a crucible of learning and growth, providing you with the skills and knowledge necessary to thrive in a globalized world.

Now, standing on the precipice of a new chapter, you prepare to leave Morocco behind and venture into uncharted territory. The future holds both challenges and rewards, but one thing is certain - your unwavering spirit, boundless curiosity, and dedication to your goals will serve as your compass.

Your journey is an inspiration to all, a testament to the power of resilience, self-belief, and a relentless pursuit of dreams. It reminds us that even from the most challenging beginnings, the most extraordinary journeys can unfold.

As you embark on this next adventure, remember the strength you have cultivated within yourself. Embrace the challenges, learn from your experiences, and never lose sight of the fire that burns within you. The world is your canvas, and your story is still being written.
